paragraphs.content: I grew up in Gujarat, where I went to immersion school that taught only in Gujarati. I received my bachelor's degree in computer engineering from LDCE (GTU) in Ahmedabad and have over 3+ years of professional experience in robotics and software development.

I recently graduated from UT Arlington in MS Comp Sci. I'm interested in the field of unmanned vehicle systems and their various applications, particularly prediction, and perception. I enjoy working with edge devices like Jetson xavier nx and Raspberry Pi to create IoT and robot solutions through hands-on experimentation. My presidency(Spring 2023) in the University of Texas at Arlington's AutonoBots club allowed me to work on robot slam and sensor fusion with lidar and camera data during the National Robotics Challenge in April 2023.

With a strong background in mathematics, programming logic, and cross-platform coding, I am eager to use my skills to develop innovative solutions in robotics, artificial intelligence, and computer vision. With my 'do it now' approach, I have experienced tremendous growth in my understanding and learning of new technologies and research papers. This proactive mindset has truly helped me forward in my unyielding quest for knowledge
Thank you for stopping by and taking an interest in my work. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
